content: they need to remain open so they meet up all nice like in the end make sure to start slip stitching your tube shut on the beginning/foundation side that way if you need to add or subtract row to make the ends of the tube meet neatly you can do so with the live stitches ashley dunham 2015 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only moonunitdesigns com after you have a nice long stuffed tube with both ends open match the seam of the tube with the edge of the rug and slip_stitch the tube all the way around the outside edge of the rug ashley dunham 2015 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only moonunitdesigns com with both ends of your tube kissing whip stitch them together make sure to pop a little extra stuffing in under the seam so it s continuously fluffy all the way around weave in ends and immediately give to a sleepy kitty cat ashley dunham 2015 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only moonunitdesigns com
